title: just hit lvl 30 and i still have 26 xp boosts remaining

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: as title says can this just become IP boosts?

replies.body: We'd like to look into your specific issue individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  Reach out to us, and we'll see if we can do anything about these remaining XP Boosts.  We'll respond as soon as we can.  Grats on 30!
